languages.text: "Нам правда... необходимо здесь находиться? Я не уверена от чего меня больше мутит, от этих ужасных цветов или запаха..."
"Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."
languages.original_text: "Нам правда... необходимо здесь находиться? Я не уверена от чего меня больше мутит, от этих ужасных цветов или запаха..."

traits.locale_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous — these horrid colours, or the smell..."

languages.text: "Müssen wir wirklich ... hier sein? Ich weiß nicht einmal, was schlimmer ist, diese grauenhaften Farben oder der Geruch ..."
languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

traits.locale_text: "Müssen wir wirklich ... hier sein? Ich weiß nicht einmal, was schlimmer ist, diese grauenhaften Farben oder der Geruch ..."

languages.text: « Sommes-nous vraiment obligés de rester là ? Je ne sais pas ce qui m'écœure le plus : ces couleurs atroces ou cette odeur... »
languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

traits.locale_text: « Sommes-nous vraiment obligés de rester là ? Je ne sais pas ce qui m'écœure le plus : ces couleurs atroces ou cette odeur... »

languages.text: «¿De verdad... tenemos que estar aquí? No sé qué me provoca más náuseas: si los horribles colores o el olor...».
languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad... tenemos que estar aquí? No sé qué me provoca más náuseas: si los horribles colores o el olor...».

languages.text: 「私達は本当に…ここにいる必要があるのでしょうか？吐き気がするのは、このおぞましい色のせいでしょうか、それとも臭いなのでしょうか…」
languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

traits.locale_text: 「私達は本当に…ここにいる必要があるのでしょうか？吐き気がするのは、このおぞましい色のせいでしょうか、それとも臭いなのでしょうか…」

languages.text: “我们真的……一定要待在这里吗？我甚至说不好是什么让我更恶心，是那些可怕的颜色，还是令人作呕的气味……”
languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

traits.locale_text: “我们真的……一定要待在这里吗？我甚至说不好是什么让我更恶心，是那些可怕的颜色，还是令人作呕的气味……”

languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

languages.text: "Gerçekten... Burada olmamıza gerek var mı? Bu berbat renklerin mi yoksa kokunun mu beni daha çok iğrendirdiğini kestiremiyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."
